actor_awards.notes: Known as the 'King of the Cowboys', he appeared in over 100 films and radio and television plays. He is the only person elected to the Country Music Hall of Fame twice (as a member of the Sons of the Pioneers and as a solo artist). He received three stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame (Motion Pictures, Television, and Radio).

filmography.title: Dark Command
filmography.role_description: The younger brother of the heroine who gets caught up in the conflict between a marshal and a guerrilla leader.
filmography.plot: A Texan marshal battles a renegade guerrilla leader in Civil War-era Kansas.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Art Direction, Best Original Score

filmography.title: Son of Paleface
filmography.role_description: A federal agent working undercover to catch a gold thief, who crosses paths with the bumbling Junior Potter.
filmography.plot: Junior Potter returns to the West to claim his father's gold, but finds the stash missing and outlaws on his tail.

filmography.title: My Pal Trigger
filmography.role_description: A horse trader who is framed for the death of a prize stallion and strives to raise the stallion's colt, Trigger.
filmography.plot: Roy Rogers is blamed for the death of a golden stallion and must raise its foal to clear his name.

filmography.title: Melody Time
filmography.role_description: The narrator and singer of the 'Pecos Bill' segment in this Disney animated package film.
filmography.plot: An anthology of seven animated segments set to contemporary music.

filmography.title: Hollywood Canteen
filmography.role_description: He appears as himself, performing 'Don't Fence Me In' for the troops with Trigger.
filmography.plot: Two soldiers on leave in Hollywood spend three nights at the Hollywood Canteen, where they meet many stars.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Original Song, Best Sound, Best Musical Score

filmography.title: Mackintosh and T.J.
filmography.role_description: An aging, drifting cowboy who takes a wayward youth under his wing. Rogers' final film role.
filmography.plot: An old drifter befriends a young boy and gets involved in a local dispute while working on a ranch.

filmography.title: Under Western Stars
filmography.role_description: A cowboy elected to Congress who fights for dust bowl relief. This was his first starring role.
filmography.plot: A cowboy runs for Congress to secure water rights for his drought-stricken region.

filmography.title: King of the Cowboys
filmography.role_description: A rodeo star recruited by the government to hunt down saboteurs during WWII.
filmography.plot: Roy Rogers goes undercover in a traveling show to expose a ring of saboteurs.

filmography.title: Bells of San Angelo
filmography.role_description: A border investigator looking into silver smuggling between Mexico and the US.
filmography.plot: Roy Rogers investigates a silver smuggling operation on the Mexican border.

filmography.title: The Cowboy and the Senorita
filmography.role_description: A cowboy who helps a young woman whose inheritance is being stolen. The first film pairing Roy with Dale Evans.
filmography.plot: Roy and Teddy help a young woman claim her rightful inheritance, a gold mine, from a swindling gambler.

filmography.title: The Golden Stallion
filmography.role_description: A rancher investigating a gang using wild horses to smuggle diamonds.
filmography.plot: Roy Rogers uncovers a plot to smuggle diamonds inside hollowed-out horseshoes on wild stallions.

filmography.title: Utah
filmography.role_description: A rancher who travels to Chicago to stop the sale of his ranch by its new owner.
filmography.plot: Roy Rogers heads to Chicago to convince the new owner of a ranch not to sell it, putting on a musical show to raise money.

filmography.title: Young Bill Hickok
filmography.role_description: A historical portrayal of the famous gunslinger during the Civil War era.
filmography.plot: Wild Bill Hickok acts as a Union agent trying to stop a gold raid by a renegade Confederate band.

filmography.title: The Carson City Kid
filmography.role_description: A bandit seeking revenge on the man who killed his younger brother.
filmography.plot: A young outlaw poses as a bandit to track down the gambler who murdered his brother.

filmography.title: Don't Fence Me In
filmography.role_description: A cowboy star who helps a magazine reporter investigate a mystery involving a legendary outlaw.
filmography.plot: A reporter investigates the mystery of a long-dead outlaw, but Roy Rogers suspects the bandit is still alive.

filmography.title: Lights of Old Santa Fe
filmography.role_description: A rodeo rider who helps a woman save her rodeo show from a rival owner.
filmography.plot: A rival rodeo owner sabotages a woman's show, and Roy Rogers steps in to help her save the business.

filmography.title: Sons of the Pioneers
filmography.role_description: A scientist from the east who returns west to help his family fight outlaws.
filmography.plot: Roy Rogers returns to the west to find his father's ranch under attack by a gang of outlaws.

filmography.title: Man from Cheyenne
filmography.role_description: A government agent sent to investigate a cattle rustling ring led by a mysterious woman.
filmography.plot: Roy Rogers investigates a series of cattle rustlings and discovers the leader is a high-society woman.

filmography.title: Colorado
filmography.role_description: A Union officer sent to Denver to stop Confederate sympathizers.
filmography.plot: During the Civil War, a Union officer is sent to Colorado to stop Confederate sympathizers from stirring up trouble.

filmography.title: Sunset in El Dorado
filmography.role_description: Rogers plays himself and tells a story where the characters are visualized by the other actors.
filmography.plot: Roy Rogers tells a story about the old west to a bored woman, who imagines herself and Roy as the main characters.

filmography.title: Heldorado
filmography.role_description: A Nevada Ranger helping to clean up a gambling syndicate during a Las Vegas festival.
filmography.plot: Roy Rogers helps clean up a gambling syndicate during the Helldorado festival in Las Vegas.

filmography.title: Heart of the Golden West
filmography.role_description: The head of a trucker's association fighting against unjust shipping rates.
filmography.plot: Roy Rogers leads a group of ranchers and truckers against a shipping company charging exorbitant rates.

filmography.title: In Old Caliente
filmography.role_description: A ranch foreman who is framed for theft by a rival.
filmography.plot: Roy Rogers is framed for stealing money from his employer by a jealous rival.

filmography.title: The Arizona Kid
filmography.role_description: A scout for the Confederate army operating in Missouri.
filmography.plot: During the Civil War, Roy Rogers works as a Confederate scout in Missouri to oppose outlaw bands.

filmography.title: Billy the Kid Returns
filmography.role_description: A dual role as the famous outlaw and a lookalike deputy sheriff sent to replace him.
filmography.plot: Following the death of Billy the Kid, a lookalike lawman is hired to impersonate the outlaw to restore order.
